https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tEA1aCERfCmrfXJmoWQse4wQM96.jpg A much loved Parisian-style bistro located in Los Angeles between a thriving McDonalds and KFC, Belle Vie is owned and operated by the charming and hopeful Vincent Samarco, who struggles to adapt, survive and keep the bistro alive in the midst of a pandemic that has ravaged small businesses everywhere. Belle Vie
